PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-00122010-01-13,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectPIZZITELLI, The Hon. Frank J., RELOCATION EXPENSES
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. FRANK J. PIZZITELLI, who was required to relocate to the City of Ottawa in the Province of Ontario, following his appointment as a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada on June 19, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: PIZZITELLI, The Hon. Frank J., RELOCATION EXPENSES
precis: Order prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. FRANK J. PIZZITELLI, who was required to relocate to the City of Ottawa in the Province of Ontario, following his appointment as a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada on June 19, 2009.
